info.title: Math Ball
info.description: Solve all sorts of simple math operations quickly with the help of your funny ball! Watch the question and point directly to the correct answer to get the result right and move on to the next level. Test your math knowledge and think quickly about the result of the operations while testing your reflexes and amazing reaction skills. Learn by playing and showing off everything you know in Math Ball! Good luck...

controls: 使用鼠标点击进行操作
instructions.howToPlay: 按照游戏内提示进行游戏，完成各种挑战任务。
